{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Madinat al-Nuhas|It|Madinat al-Nuhas}} was once an underground [[Khaenri'ah]]n weapons testing facility, particularly for [[Ruin Machine]]s. It even contains an incomplete prototype [[Ruin Golem]].<ref name="Nirodha">{{Ref/Quest|As the Khvarena's Light Shows: Nirodha}}</ref> It is powered by [[Azosite]], much like [[Hangeh Afrasiyab]].</p>}}

Madinat al-Nuhas can be accessed from the west end of [[Asipattravana Swamp]] and extends out beneath the [[Samudra Coast]]. It is unlocked during the {{Quest|As the Khvarena's Light Shows: Nirodha}}.

==Trivia==
* Apparently, Madinat al-Nuhas was once modified for use as fortifications from which Abyss monsters could be attacked, although it "didn't see much use in that regard."<ref name="Nirodha" />
===Etymology===
* {{Lang|''Madinat al-Nuhas''|ar=مدينة النحاس}}, meaning "city of brass," is a story within ''{{w|A Thousand and One Nights}}''.
